title: The Millionaire's Proposition
description: THE MILLIONAIRE'S PROPOSITIONHe suggested a 'friends with benefits' arrangement...It was going to be:* Two nights a week* Strictly confidential* One month only...Weirdly, it might have been his proposition, but lawyer Kate Cleary is so buttoned up she whips out a contract for them both to sign! Seeing her in her high heels and stockings, all Scott Knight can do is sign and move quickly on to the implementation stage!Kate couldn't be more jaded about relationships. After all, she's in the business of ending marriages! Millionaire architect Scott might be seriously sexy, but he's also a complicated enigma-one she's quickly becoming determined to solve...even if that means breaking the terms of her own watertight contract...BOOK 2 OF SYDNEY'S MOST ELIGIBLE...A stylish, sexy and glamorous new quartet!Young, rich and gorgeous, Rob, Scott, Brodie and Luke have the world at their feet and women queuing to get between their sheets.These sexy Sydney tycoons didn't get to the top by taking the easy way-the only thing they love more than a challenge is a woman who knows her own mind!So let the fireworks begin...!HER BOSS BY DAY... by Joss Wood - January 2015THE MILLIONAIRE'S PROPOSITION by Avril Tremayne - February 2015THE TYCOON'S STOWAWAY by Stefanie London - March 2015THE HOTEL MAGNATE'S DEMAND by Jennifer Rae - April 2015Discover more at www.millsandboon.co.uk/avriltremayne
author: Avril Tremayne
